description: A beautiful girl, so stunning that no words can describe her beauty.

options.playerText: What do you do for a living?
npcTexts: I’m a model.
Mostly I smile, pose… and make sure people can’t look away.
Simply because of work.
I had a few photoshoots in this old apartment.
I don’t fear the dark. I don’t fear blood.
I only fear… that no one will look at me anymore.
I’ve heard that plenty of times. That’s sweet of you.
But… I won’t be swayed that easily.
Next time, try dressing up a little.
You don’t look too bad though.
Stressful?
Not at all. This job gives me money, fame.
I love it.
Oh, I always have so many fans.
But in this apartment, it seems no one has recognized me yet.
I fear the day I grow old…
When I’m no longer as beautiful as I am now.

options.playerText: May I take you out to dinner?
npcTexts: I think you should pick a place with beautiful lighting.
Because, you know, a model like me always deserves the perfect setting.
Good night, I need to rest for tomorrow’s shoot.
But maybe someday I’ll have time for you.
Of course.
If I ever quit modeling, I’d probably become an actress.
Look at me—don’t I have the looks for it?
I fear losing this beauty…
But maybe I’ll never truly grow ugly.
I used to diet to stay in shape.
But now… I don’t think it’s necessary.
I don’t feel hungry anymore.

options.playerText: What if I asked you to dinner?
npcTexts: If you insist, then maybe next week.
But honestly… I don’t feel like eating right now.
Maybe by then I’ll crave something.
Don’t say goodbye, say ‘see you soon.’
In this shabby place, having you to talk to every night isn’t so bad.
A whole day of shooting left me exhausted.
Everyone else looked disgusting.
Only I will always remain beautiful.
I fear nothing anymore.
Now I am the one with eternal beauty.
Tell me, do you like me?

options.playerText: Do you want to eat something?
npcTexts: Today I had a lot of raw food…
I mean dishes like sashimi, sushi.
But you… you look delicious too. Too bad I’m already full.

options.playerText: What about our date next week?
npcTexts: Next week?
Why not tomorrow instead?
I hope you’ll come pick me up…
...And then we can truly enjoy ourselves.
Goodbye.
I’m looking forward to tomorrow. I think I’m starting to like you.
